attributes.action: make Drama a compulsory National Curriculum subject in its own right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At a time when teachers are leaving the profession due to poor funding and non-recognition of drama as a subject in its own right and a means of engaging students in what should be an essential element of the school curriculum. Drama needs adequate funding, the support of senior management teams and recognition as a relevant and stimulating subject outside the umbrella of English.
